appendix.title: Perl DBD Server
appendix.subtitle: HSQLDB BER Server for Perl DBI/DBD

section.title: Purpose
section.simpara: This document explains how to run a HSQLDB Server which will serve JDBC network requests to Perl DBD:JDBC clients: namely, a BerServer. By directly, I mean that the connection will be directly from your perl program to the HSQLDB BerServer-- not through a proxy server, which would otherwise be required by Perl DBD:JDBC.
